SELECT a.*,i.item_name,i.item_price,i.unit,c.cname,e.ename,d.dept_name,(a.apply_num * i.item_price) total_price FROM apply a LEFT JOIN item i ON a.item_id = i.item_id LEFT JOIN category c on i.cid = c.cid LEFT JOIN employee e ON a.eid = e.eid left JOIN department d ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id
and a.dept_id = ${apply.deptId}
and DATE_FORMAT(apply_date,'%Y-%m-%d') = '${apply.date}'
and DATE_FORMAT(apply_date,'%Y-%m') = '${apply.date}'
and DATE_FORMAT(apply_date,'%Y') = '${apply.date}'
order by a.apply_id asc

SELECT
date_format(apply_date,'%Y-%m') summary_date,
date_format(apply_date,'%Y') summary_date,
i.item_name,i.unit, d.dept_name, SUM(a.apply_num) apply_num, SUM(a.apply_num * i.item_price) total_price FROM apply a LEFT JOIN item i ON a.item_id = i.item_id LEFT JOIN category c on i.cid = c.cid LEFT JOIN employee e ON a.eid = e.eid left JOIN department d ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id
and a.dept_id = ${apply.deptId}
and DATE_FORMAT(apply_date,'%Y-%m') = '${apply.date}'
and DATE_FORMAT(apply_date,'%Y') = '${apply.date}'
GROUP BY d.dept_name,i.item_name,i.unit,apply_date ORDER BY d.dept_name

SELECT d.dept_name,SUM(a.apply_num * i.item_price) total_price FROM apply a LEFT JOIN item i ON a.item_id = i.item_id LEFT JOIN category c on i.cid = c.cid LEFT JOIN employee e ON a.eid = e.eid left JOIN department d ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id
and a.dept_id = ${apply.deptId}
and DATE_FORMAT(apply_date,'%Y-%m') = '${apply.date}'
and DATE_FORMAT(apply_date,'%Y') = '${apply.date}'
GROUP BY d.dept_name

select ifnull(sum(a.apply_num * i.item_price),0) from apply a left join item i on a.item_id = i.item_id
and a.dept_id = ${apply.deptId}
and DATE_FORMAT(apply_date,'%Y-%m') = '${apply.date}'
and DATE_FORMAT(apply_date,'%Y') = '${apply.date}'
